transcript:
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello sir, main Puneet Prakash baat kar raha hun.
Customer: Sir main IndiaMART se business manager se baat kar raha hun, Puneet kar raha hun.
Executive: Ji bataiye.
Executive: Sir abhi aapne recently hamare sath Naveen Architect and Interior Designer na, company register karwai thi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan sir yahan pe aapko issue aa raha hai ki aapko Prayagraj se lead chahiye sir, right?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To Prayagraj aur Prayagraj se sir 50-100 kilometers mein aap kam kar payenge.
Executive: Other location mein sir nahi kam kar payenge lead ke lekar ke aap?
Customer: Karte hain lekin aisa bhi nahi hai ki ab 200-250 kilometer 300 kilometer tak healthy rehta hai.
Customer: Prayagraj karte hain aas paas ke bhi areas mein karte hain lekin of course locally leads jitni jyada milti hain utna kam karna aasan rehta hai, hai na? Hum koi product nahi bechte na, hum services dete hain.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: To product bechna aasan rehta hai aapne kahin se bhi aap material ko dispatch kar dijiye, hai na? Lekin humen services dena hai to bhi wahan tak reach out karna padta hai.
Customer: To better hai ki matlab 80-90-100 kilometer tak aasan rehta hai kam karna, itna comfortable rehta hai lekin ab 200-250 kilometer ke range mein aur bhi bade shahar aa jate hain to phir koi matlab nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm samajh gaya sir, aap bilkul correct hai apne path pe, ab kya hai na sir ki isme jo buyleads ki generation hoti hai IndiaMART se, right? Hmm. Jab aapke Prayagraj se 150 kilometers mein utni matlab per day aa paye ya weekly aa paye isme main koi number commit nahi kar sakta. Ye number kya hai na kabhi jyada bhi ja sakta hai kabhi kam bhi ja sakta hai.
Executive: Jo depending on the ki kya us location se inquiry hamare paas IndiaMART se aa rahi hai. To jaise jo aapko hafte ke hum 17-22 de rahe hain na IndiaMART se.
Executive: Wo mahine ke aapke around 68 ho jati hai ye. To as such main sure nahi ho sakta hun ki aapko 68 buyleads mein confirm karwa hi dunga.
Executive: To ye cheez main aapse sunna chah raha tha ki is case mein kya karenge sir? Kyunki since aapka service area hai sir main kuch aur categories wagera dekh leta hun ki kya isme improvement kar sakte hain. But sir ye buyleads 100% fulfill ho paye iske liye main sure nahi hun sir.
Customer: Aapke location. Ye jo aapke field agents the ye inko nahi samajh mein aaya?
Executive: Nahi sir. Sir iski galti nahi hai sir dekhiye. Aapne bilkul sahi bataya hoga.
Executive: Unhone bhi jo aapko onboard kiya na, to isi basis pe ki kya scope ho sakta hai, right? Hum dekh rahe hain aapka generation sir, itni scope hamare paas utna jyada nahi aa pa raha sir. Main jhooth nahi bolunga kyunki aapko daily ka dikhega sir 5-22 ka bhi humne option bana rakha hai ki Prayagraj aur aapke aas paas ke cities se kitni aa rahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai. Main dekh raha hun na usme usme koi jhooth aap bol bol ke bhi aap matlab koi aisa cheez thodi nahi chhupa lenge, main dekh raha hun. Aur aap bhi is cheez ko check kar sakte hain. Ultimately jo main aapko pay kiya ya jis condition se meri cheezein done hui thi aur wo jab fulfill hi nahi ho rahi to phir main kya karun usme aap bataiye.
Executive: Sir main wahi clear expectation aapse rakh ke baat karna chah raha hun ki kya hai na ki hum hum try kar sakte hain kuch aur categories wagera add karke dekhen kya improvement kya kya cheezein aa sakti hain ek do din tak. Nahi to agar aapko wo nahi lag raha useful to main sir as it is aapka ek request dal dunga service deactivation ke liye. Agar main us cheez ko fulfill nahi kar paunga to. Yahi keh sakta hun main maximum sir do cheezein. Sir agar mujhe aap thoda samay denge to main ek baar aapke sath video meeting pe baith kar ke jaise Manish ne kiya tha. Sir main aapke sath properly baith kar ke jaise service agar deactivation mein hum dalte hain to refund ka kya rahega system, kaise rahega?
Executive: Sir refund ka system ye rahega na sir jaise abhi aapne IndiaMART ko pay kiya sir.
Executive: Aapne ₹36,000 aapne ₹7,000 pay kiya tha sir, hai na? Ji. Haan to ek saal ke liye diya tha 365 din ke liye per day ki jo costing nikal ke aayegi sir wo aapke kareeban ₹103 ki costing nikal ke aati hai. Right sir? Aapne ye ₹40,000 per day ki costing aap aap per day ki costing aap isme se deduct karenge?
Executive: Haan sir per day ki costing deduct hogi to saat number pe aapka kabhi 10 din hota hai aapka us hisab se 10 din ki costing yani ₹1000 ke aas paas wo amount deduct hoke aapke baki paise refund mil jayenge sir aisa hoga process mein.
Customer: Nahi to deduct kyun karenge jab main aapki conditions pe hi nahi fulfill hue? Aur aisa to nahi main 10 din mahine bhar baad us cheez ko kar raha hun, aap isko full pura refund kariye. Deduct aap kyun kis base pe aap karenge deduct? Aap apni condition se pura huiye. Mujhe to koi dikkat nahi, maine to pay kiya hai na aapko.
Executive: Bilkul theek hai sir. Jab aap apni conditions pe stand nahi kar rahe hain. Aapke base hisab se. Nahi baat iski hai ki base hisab se jab aap deduct karne pe aa rahe hain to phir main try hit and try ki to baat hi nahi hai. Phir aap mere se bolenge sir main agar 20 din baad is baat ko bolta hun ki theek hai aap isko close kariye to aap phir kahenge sir ₹2000 katega.
Customer: Hit and trial wala method to nahi mere ko apnana na. Ya to aap boliye ki theek hai sir aapke ₹1 main nahi katunga aap mujhe thoda aur time dijiye. Tab to main aapki baatein main matlab tikta hun, chaliye theek hai aap bhi try kar lijiye mujhe koi problem nahi. Lekin agar per day ke mere cost katne hi katne hain to phir isme mere ko rukne ka kya matlab hai?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aap samajh rahe hain meri baat?
Executive: Bilkul sir main bilkul samajh raha hun sir aap you are right on your path sir.
Customer: Matlab main aapke conditions pe aapke jo bhi cheezein tay hui maine us pe apni cheezein aapke sath okay ki, right?
Customer: Ab agar aap agar mere location pe agar aapki cheezein generate nahi ho rahi hain to ye meri galti nahi hai na?
Executive: Ji sir main bilkul bol raha hun aapki koi galti nahi hai sir. Definitely sir main aapko blame nahi dal raha usme. Nahi nahi aap blame to nahi dal rahe lekin ultimately mere ko pay off aap nahi kar rahe na us cheez ka. Blame aap daliye mat lekin on return aap to mere paise kaat kaat hi rahe ho.
Customer: To agar blame na dalne se to acha aap blame daliye paise mat katiye main sun lunga wo cheez. Paise aap kyun kaat rahe hain bhai mere?
Executive: Hmm hmm. Theek hai sir main is cheez ko main is tarah blame nahi dal raha hun lekin main sir paise katunga aapke ye to matlab bahut acha mazak hua na.
Executive: Hmm nahi sir.
Customer: Main apne aise paise main nahi main ready hun katwane ke liye kyunki meri taraf se koi cheez ki kami rahi ho to aap bataiye, hai na? Aap maine apni taraf se sari cheezein di hain aap isko agar aap aur hold karna chah rahe hain apni taraf se try karna chah rahe hain to main paise nahi katwane wala. Immediately isko aaj se aaj agar terminate karna hai to aaj ke aaj isko terminate kariye.
Customer: Hmm. Aap samajh pa rahe hain?
Executive: Bilkul sir main puri baat follow kar raha hun aapki. Haan to aap isko jaise bhi you know na agar aapko lagta hai ki sir theek hai humen thoda time dijiye apne end se aap try karna chah rahe hain ki yahan cheezein better ho sakti hain jo ki mujhe doubt hai, hai na? To agar phir bhi aap try karna chah rahe hain aap kariye hafte 10 din kariye 20 din kariye mujhe koi nahi lekin aap paise mat katiye phir aap 20 din baad agar cheezein nahi settle hoti hain to phir aap ye nahi bol sakte ki sir aapke per day ke itne cost hoti hai aur main itna katunga ye koi matlab nahi hua na.
Customer: Aap ek to aap apni conditions pe nahi pure ho rahe hain aur upar se aap paise mere kaatenge, isse fayda kya hua?
Executive: Right sir. Main khud agar mahine do mahine baad agar in cheezon ko hua hota tab main samajh mein aata lekin jab day one se hi is cheezon ko maine aapki taraf se koi ek lead consume nahi ki, na maine koi uska fayda uthaya aap mere paise kaat lenge, jaise is cheez ke liye ki maine aapse subscription aapne matlab maine aapse karz kar rakha hai.
Customer: Hai na? Aapke jo field agents hain jis din paisa lena hota hai us din aate hain. Contract contract karwane ke liye 10 baar mere paas phone karte hain aur jis din se contract hua hai us din ke baad ek baar bande ne mere ko muh nahi dikhaya apna. Ye to halat hai aap logon ki service ki.
Customer: Hai na?
Customer: Hmm. Matlab jab tak kam chahiye tab tak aap log main aap hi logon ka naam lunga personally mat lijiyega main as an company baat kar raha hun, chahe wo aapke ho chahe aap ho chahe koi bhi. Jab tak unko is cheez ko karwana tha mere ko din mein teen baar phone kar sir main aa jaun karwa lun ye karwa lun wo karwa lun aaj aa jaiye sir aaj aa jata hun sir do din baad phone pe phone phone pe phone kyunki unko kam chahiye tha, right? Hmm. Aur jab jis din maine payment kar di aur jis din se ye cheez ho gayi us din ke baad ek baar usne jo hai office nahi aake in sari problems pe baat ki hai. Maine usko phone bhi kiya phone nahi uthata hai kabhi kabhi kabhi phone uthayega sir main karwa raha hun main baat kar raha hun. Are aap register office aake aapne kyun nahi mila? Aise kam hote hain markets mein. To bahut trust worthy nahi raha mera experience to main yahi kahunga agar aapko paise katne hain to usko aaj ke aaj terminate kariye.
Executive: Haan sir IndiaMART se aap. Theek hai sir. Kyunki isko agar isme na haan actually main aapko batata hun. Ji. Haan haan haan. Ji sir main us pe aur na further ek baar discussion karke aapko update karta hun sir. Main main kya pata kya deduction hai. Sir aapko kal subah karunga sir main. Theek hai kariye. Lekin main is cheez ke liye bahut aapke clear cut thoda sa. Main samajh gaya tha main aapki baat ko samajh gaya hun. Hmm hmm. Haan main usko sir deduction ka koi logic nahi hai na. Bilkul sir. Kyunki abhi hardly mushkil se 10 din hue hain 10 din ho rahe hain 10 din mein se maine ek bhi kam nahi kiya aapki taraf se na aapne mere ko itni leads provide ki hain na kuch bhi. To wo jab rahi nahi cheezein to phir usme kya banta hai aise cheezon ko baat karne ka. Aapko to apni taraf se in cheezon ko bolna chahiye aap per day ka agar paise katne lagenge to phir to theek hai. Aap isko discussion karke close kariye, hai na?
Executive: Ji sir. Haan. Aur please ye sari cheezein mujhe mail mein dal mail mein aap dalenge?
Executive: Sir main morning mein dal dunga. Ek final discussion jab aapke sath karunga ek main apne senior discussion karke final discussion jab aapke sath conclude karunga to mail pe dalunga. To ye cheezein morning mein chala ke dunga aapko. Aapke everything. Okay theek hai. Theek hai. Okay theek hai, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants leads from Prayagraj.

- Dissatisfied with the number of leads.

- Objects to deduction for unfulfilled conditions.

- Expresses frustration with field agent's lack of support.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to explore additional categories.

- Executive offered service deactivation.

- Executive will discuss the refund process.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer next morning.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, service, deactivation, field agent
